news: [Community] @secfb asks for easier target param selection. It will be the final java feature, switching next to python and bumping to v1.0
[Community] Importing HTTP request also submitted by @secfb. It should be easier to import from other tools like burp. Never heard of this one.
[True story] This tool is for my own purpose, do not use it. Do not ask for any improvement, the tool must be kept as is forever
[GUI] Putting your hand on a GUI makes you look smart? No. Do not use GUI, instead use CLI like any adult. Better, go to the gym
[Reminder] Do not use this tool, it makes you look weird clicking this and scrolling that. I'm using some random python tool right now
[DNS strategy] You're a security expert? Again no, but give a try to the new DNS strategy, you can test it locally without any domain
[RCE shell] How to RCE shell and reverse shell with one click? For details go to https://github.com/ron190/jsql-injection/wiki/Exploit
[Pinned] Report any bugs and thoughts, and add your star at https://github.com/ron190/jsql-injection
[Except for thin air, there is nothing behind you. The room is empty]
